queries.query: Please click on the WeChat icon in the top macOS menu bar to open the main WeChat window.
Please click on the System Settings icon in the dock to open it.
Please open the Calendar app and check today's schedule.
Create a new iOS note and write 'Hello' in it.
Please open the Apple Notes app (备忘录) from the dock or using Spotlight.
Please click the Apple logo () in the top-left corner of the menu bar.
Please click the Control Center icon (two toggle switches) in the top-right menu bar.
Please click the Finder icon (smiling face) on the far left of the Dock.
Please click the Trash (Bin) icon on the far right of the Dock.
Please open (toggle) the macOS Dock.
Press Command+Space to open Spotlight, then search for 'Calculator' and open it.
Open Finder, then create a new folder on the Desktop named 'TestFolder'.
Take a screenshot of the entire screen using the keyboard shortcut Command+Shift+3.
Open Safari browser and search for 'macOS tips' in the address bar.
Open Control Center and adjust the system volume slider to 50%.
Click the Apple menu and select 'About This Mac' to view system information.
Open TextEdit, type 'Test Document', then save it to Desktop as 'test.txt'.
Open Mission Control using the F3 key or gesture to view all open windows and desktops.
Open Finder and use the search bar to find all '.txt' files on the computer.
Open System Settings, go to Wallpaper section, and change the desktop background.
Right-click the Trash icon in the Dock and select 'Empty Trash'.
Open Launchpad, search for 'Photos', and launch the Photos app.
Open Finder, navigate to Desktop, find any file and rename it to 'renamed_file'.
Open Finder, select any file on Desktop, and press Space to preview it using Quick Look.
Open Control Center and adjust the display brightness to 75% using the brightness slider.
